The Farmer's Curse

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What is this game?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Farmer's Curse put a twist on traditional farming simulators. The goal of the game is to plant crops to harvest the ingredients needed to fufill orders, HOWEVER, certain crops are incompatible with one another which means that they cannot be placed in the same horizontal or vertical line. This requires you plan out your farming layouts to harvest the optimal number of crops.
